snippet: Cautious investors are studying Europe and awaiting the full array of corporate reports next week.
abstract: Wall Street markets end little changed in a volatile session amid continuing uncertainty in Europe.
lead_paragraph: Cautious investors are studying Europe and awaiting the full array of corporate reports next week.

headline.seo: Despite Volatile Markets, Little Change at the Close
headline.main: Despite a Volatile Day, Little Change by the End
headline.print_headline: Despite a Volatile Day, Little Change by the End
